title: Director of Tennis - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Director of Tennis Posted/Updated: 10-23-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsible for all aspects of the tennis program including recruitment of potential student-athletes, academic success of student-athletes, supervision of the assistant coach, scheduling, match...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
